name: Avoiding AI Behavioral Profiling
description: Countermeasures against AI-driven behavioral tracking, predictive profiling, and digital influence operations.

cards.title: Understanding AI Surveillance and Behavioral Tracking
cards.description: Analyzing how AI algorithms track, predict, and manipulate human behavior online.
bulletpoints: Examining AI-driven sentiment analysis and profiling.
Understanding social credit systems and behavioral ranking models.
cards.summaryText: Explains how AI sentiment scoring, influence ops, and behavioral ranking frameworks surveil and steer users.

cards.title: Disrupting Data Harvesting and AI Profiling
cards.description: Techniques for obfuscating digital behavior and disrupting AI-driven tracking models.
bulletpoints: Using AI noise generation tools to pollute data profiles.
Employing behavioral obfuscation techniques in online interactions.
cards.summaryText: Details fingerprint defenses, noise injection, and obfuscation habits that degrade AI profiling accuracy.

cards.title: Evading Predictive Programming and Algorithmic Manipulation
cards.description: Escaping the psychological influence of AI-driven content curation and mass behavior programming.
bulletpoints: Avoiding mass social conditioning through AI feeds.
Using counter-engagement strategies to break predictive modeling.
cards.summaryText: Shows how to spot AI nudges, sidestep conditioned feeds, and feed disruptive signals back into predictive models.
